decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Drawing no: 748-P0.001-A(Site Location Plan)Dated 29/12/2024.
Drawing no: 748-P0.002-A(Block Plan) Dated 29/12/2024.
Drawing no: 748-P1.001-B (Ground Floor Plan - Existing & Demolition) Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.101-C(Proposed Ground Floor Plan )Dated 29/12/2024 
Drawing no: 748-P1.002-B(First Floor Plan - Existing & Demolition)Dated 29/12/2024.
Drawing no: 748-P1.102-B (Proposed First Floor Plan) Dated 29/12/2024  
Drawing no: 748-P1.003-B(Second Floor Plan - Existing & Demolition)Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.103-B(Proposed Second Floor Plan)Dated 29/12/2024
 Drawing no: 748-P1.004-B(Loft Floor Plan - Existing & Demolition)Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.104-B(Proposed Loft Floor Plan) Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.005-B(Roof Plan - Existing & Demolition)Dated 29/12/2024.
Drawing no: 748-P1.105-B(Proposed Roof Plan) Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.006-B(Front Elevation  Plan - Existing & Demolition)Dated 29/12/2024.
Drawing no: 748-P1.106-B(Proposed Front Elevation  Plan )Dated 29/12/2024 
Drawing no: 748-P1.007-B(Rear Elevation  Plan - Existing & Demolition)Dated 29/12/2024 
Drawing no: 748-P1.107-B(Proposed Rear Elevation Plan)Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.008-B(Side Elevation Plan  - Existing & Demolition) Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.108-B(Proposed Side Elevation Plan)Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.009-B(Side Elevation Plan  - Existing & Demolition) Dated 29/12/2024
Drawing no: 748-P1.109-B(Proposed Side Elevation Plan)Dated 29/12/2024
Site Photographs Received on 25 January   2025

Condition : 3 - Materials as Specified - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Construction Times - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 5 - INFORMATIVE (Party Wall Act) - The applicant is advised to check the requirements of the Party Wall Act 1996 relating to work on an existing wall shared with another property, building on the boundary with a neighbouring property, or excavating near a neighbouring building. Further information is available at the following link: 
https://www.gov.uk/party-walls-building-works

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE
Note to Applicant -Approved Schemes
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework, London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to the delivery of sustainable development, by:
1. Providing a formal pre-application advice service, details to be found on Planning pre-application advice service on LBM's website
2. Providing written policies and guidance, which is available to view on LBM's website.
3. Where appropriate, negotiating amendments to secure a positive decision.
4. Determining applications in a timely manner including providing a fast track service, details to be found on Get a quicker planning decision on LBM's website.

In this instance:
i) The application was acceptable as submitted, and approved without delay.
description: ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION AT GROUND FLOOR LEVEL AND REMOVAL OF EXISTING PAVED STEPS TO ALLOW FOR ADDITIONAL PARKING SPACE.
